item.description:
Boston Investors Business Daily Tuesday Meetup

This meeting is an alternative agenda to the Wednesday meeting. It is mostly discussion and stock tips. Since the Wednesday meeting has a tighter agenda - with scheduled speakers at each meeting - the Tuesday meeting is currently intended to have a free exchange of questions and knowledge. All levels of expertise are welcome.

Over time this agenda can change as new needs become apparent.

Map directions:
Location: MIT Room E51-145. MIT, 77 Mass Ave, Cambridge, MA, USA.
(This building is on the far eastern side of the MIT
campus, about a ten minute walk from the main entrance,
and about two minutes from the Kendall Square 'T' stop.
The location is shown on this campus map:

http://whereis.mit.ed...
item.name: Boston Investors Business Daily Tuesday Meetup
